name: Beeline (Francois van Niekerk, Tcuptempest)
description:
Build up speed to find flowers, knock out obstacles, and make your hive the biggest in the valley!

By Francois van Niekerk & Wessel Matthews

Music: Heart So Torn inst. by Kesta, licensed under a Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License. Shapes by Freya Holmér. Hexagonal Grids by Amit Patel.

Made for Ludum Dare 52.
